channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried encouraged Adderall use says ex-girlfriend Caroline Ellison in bid to avoid prison

item.title: Here’s the inflation breakdown for August 2024 — in one chart
item.description: The consumer price index rose by 2.5% in August, on an annual basis. It was the lowest reading since February 2021.
